name: xml-cdata-editor
description: Simple Extension to edit code written inside CDATA tags in an XML file (WIP support for JavaScript)

xmlCdataConfig.programmingLanguage.description: The programming language to use for the extension.

xmlCdataConfig.programmingLanguageExtens.description: The file extension to use for the created files.

xmlCdataConfig.cdataPosition.description: Where do you want the CDATA files to open relative to the XML file ? (Left or Right)

xmlCdataConfig.updateDelay.description: Time to wait before syncing the changes of the CDATA files back to the XML file (in milliseconds). Keep in mind that a low enough value will trigger repetitive flashing for each keystroke. (You'll probably have to re-open the XML and CDATA files for this change to take effect)

xmlCdataConfig.openDelay.description: Time to wait before opening the CDATA files (in milliseconds). Keep in mind that a low enough value might cause issues if there's multiple/big CDATA tags and you have linters that will take time to check each file.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
